divs: Sighting DetailsMe and 4 of our friends were sitting outside the taco bell parking lot and one of my friends looked in the sky and said what is that? and we looked and saw a bright light hovering dropping a cone shaped light from the bright light and after 30 seconds of staring at it ,it disappeared and what looked like a a light fog or mist seemed to just float where the object was hovering...we all are overly excited and exstatic...we still do not understand what we saw...we been trying to debunk it and there is nothing we could think of or ever seen...it was the unknown
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Queensbury
There were no other sightings in Queensbury on or around September 19th 2009
Summary: Bright light shining with cone shaped beam shining under it surrounded by a light fog
